metadata.name: init_array_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests INIT_ARRAY opcode (0x42) - creates array objects with specified elements, accesses array.length property, and retrieves elements by numeric index. Tests empty arrays, simple numeric arrays, mixed-type arrays, and out-of-bounds access.

missing_features: Nested arrays (arrays containing other arrays) - GET_MEMBER needs enhancement to properly handle array elements that are themselves arrays
